83950.summary: Some customers in the Dog Creek area of Williams Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83950.title: Oct 20 - Williams Lake (Dog Creek) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

84015.title: Oct 21 - Calgary (Dover) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
